title: Automated with self-recovery
text:
This component supports the automated ingest of a range of ingest types (particularly WMO messages and data from automatic weather stations).

The component also allows for the automatic recovery of ingest tasks in the event that a task fails either entirely or part way through an ingest. This could be due to a number of reasons, including:
1. Corrupted messages
2. Network failures
3. Hard disk failures
4. Database failures
5. Upstream data flow disruptions
